original: Oghaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ogho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….
analyzed: ogham dhammam paṭicca oghaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā pe

original: Yogaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca yogo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe…. (Dvepi gocchakā āsavagocchakasadisā ninnānākaraṇā.)
analyzed: yogam dhammam paṭicca yogaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā pe dve pi gocchakā āsava gocchaka sadisā ninnānākaraṇā
